intro: Centema polygonoides, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage and bright yellow daisy-like flowers. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes many other daisies and sunflowers. It typically grows in well-drained soils and prefers full sun. Centema polygonoides is often used in ornamental gardening for its attractive appearance and drought tolerance.
